GSD.product_version: versions from v2.6.18 to before v5.15.58
GSD.description:
tcp: Fix data-races around sysctl_tcp_slow_start_after_idle.

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.58 by commit 41aeba4506f6b70ec7500c6fe202731a4ba29fe5, it was introduced in version v2.6.18 by commit 35089bb203f44e33b6bbb6c4de0b0708f9a48921. For more details please see the references link.
